name: Octopus Style
text: You anticipate the attacks of more than one enemy at once.
prerequisites: Dex 13, Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, Acrobatics 1 rank, Perception 1 rank.
benefit: As a move action when using this style, you can select a number of creatures you are aware of equal to your Dexterity modifier. You canâ€™t be flanked by the selected creatures until the start of your next turn.
